title: Topic 001 Question 077
body: You have a large Cloud SQL for PostgreSQL instance. The database instance is not mission-critical, and you want to minimize operational costs. What should you do to lower the cost of backups in this environment?
options: Set the automated backups to occur every other day to lower the frequency of backups.
Change the storage tier of the automated backups from solid-state drive (SSD) to hard disk drive (HDD).
Select a different region to store your backups.
Reduce the number of automated backups that are retained to two (2).
